name: Allergenium
description: Allergenium it’s not a typical survival game. The world created has a unique aspect which has destroyed most of the humanity. You're one of the few who survived the new face of destruction – ALLERGY!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
